text: How come cropping images is not yet supported? Suggested like 4 years ago and keeps getting requested every now and then by the community.. <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/HubSpot-Ideas/Add-crop-functionality-to-the-resize-image-url-function/idi-p/266119>

I don't know about adding a custom css but you can give your section a class and target that.

{% dnd_section
    class="my-custom-section"
%}
you would have to look at what the error in the console is for the slider to help debug this.
here is how you crop in HubSpot: <https://www.loom.com/share/a30783d763294127976ffdd5c087d198>

The first place to start would be fixing your comparison operator — you’ve got an assignment operator (`=`) instead of a comparison operator (`==`). :)
```{% if row.external == null %}```
thanks, I guess that is an alternative but I would have prefered to be able to do this in code rather than requiring my client to crop manually like this
